snippet: How much Mark Sanchez improves will be a critical factor to the Jets’ success, but it is almost secondary to how he intends to fix what is clearly a toxic situation.
abstract: Analysis; how much New York Jets quarterback Mark Sanchez improves will be a critical factor to the team's success, but it is almost secondary to the leadership he must display through what is clearly a toxic situation.
lead_paragraph: How much Mark Sanchez improves will be a critical factor to the Jets’ success, but it is almost secondary to how he intends to fix what is clearly a toxic situation.

headline.seo: Jets’ Sanchez Has Much to Do in Off-Season
headline.main: Sanchez’s Chore: Cleaning Up the Mess
headline.print_headline: Sanchez’s Chore: Cleaning Up the Mess
